subject: Philosophy
title: The Way of Confucius
description: Learn The Way of Confucius in one minute.

hook.text: Confucius didn't claim to be original. He said he was just transmitting ancient wisdom.

buildup.text: Born in 551 BCE during China's chaotic Warring States era, he sought to restore social harmony.

discovery.text: His philosophy centers on relationships, ritual, education, and moral self-cultivation.

twist.text: He was mostly ignored during his lifetime. His students preserved his teachings in the Analects.

climax.text: Confucianism eventually shaped Chinese civilization for over two thousand years â€” government, family, and ethics.

punchline.text: The teacher the world ignored became its guide.

quiz.question: What was Confucius's primary goal?
options: Restoring social harmony through moral behavior
